org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.performance

Class PerformanceTracker

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.nd4j.linalg.api.ops.performance.PerformanceTracker

  • public class PerformanceTracker
extends java.lang.Object
    This class provides routines for performance tracking and holder for corresponding results

    • Method Detail

      • getInstance

        public static PerformanceTracker getInstance()

      • addMemoryTransaction

        public long addMemoryTransaction(int deviceId,
                                 long timeSpentNanos,
                                 long numberOfBytes)
        This method stores bandwidth used for given transaction. PLEASE NOTE: Bandwidth is stored in per millisecond value.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - device used for this transaction
        timeSpent - time spent on this transaction in nanoseconds
        numberOfBytes - number of bytes

      • addMemoryTransaction

        public long addMemoryTransaction(int deviceId,
                                 long timeSpentNanos,
                                 long numberOfBytes,
                                 @NonNull
                                 MemcpyDirection direction)
        This method stores bandwidth used for given transaction. PLEASE NOTE: Bandwidth is stored in per millisecond value.
        Parameters:
        deviceId - device used for this transaction
        timeSpent - time spent on this transaction in nanoseconds
        numberOfBytes - number of bytes
        direction - direction for the given memory transaction
